verbs.description: A day after [ARG0: MSNBC ’s Hardball host Chris Matthews] [V: called] out [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: for “ coming out like a kiss butt ” in dealing with North Korea ’s Kim Jong - un] , the liberal pundit reveled on Wednesday in comparing Republicans to North Korean soldiers and comments by Tennessee Republican Senator Bob Corker that GOPers are part of a “ cult ” for enthusiastically backing President .
